<title level="1" pfs="">[Dragonstorm Fire Giant](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1587)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 43

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 41

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 38
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 18">[Dragonstorm Fire Giant](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1587)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="NE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Huge" />
<trait label="Giant" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=79" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #150: Broken Promises](/Sources.aspx?ID=15) pg. 12</row>

**Perception** +30; [low-light vision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=23)

**Languages**
[Auran](/Languages.aspx?ID=15), [Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Draconic](/Languages.aspx?ID=2), [Jotun](/Languages.aspx?ID=8)

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +31, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +35, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +35

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +9

**Dex** +6

**Con** +7

**Int** +3

**Wis** +5

**Cha** +2
</row>

**Items**
_+2 [greater striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [greatsword](/Weapons.aspx?ID=24)_, _+2 [greater resilient](/Equipment.aspx?ID=279) [hide armor](/Armor.aspx?ID=7)_, [sack with 5 rocks](/Equipment.aspx?ID=45)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 42 

**Fort** +33 

**Ref** +27 

**Will** +30 

</row>

**HP** 400

**Immunities**
[fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=72)

**Resistances**
[acid](/Traits.aspx?ID=3) 20, [electricity](/Traits.aspx?ID=56) 20, [cold](/Traits.aspx?ID=27) 20, [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126) 20

**Weaknesses**
good 20

**[Catch Rock](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=7)** <actions string="Reaction" /> 

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 35 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
_greatsword_ +35 ([Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [reach 15 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192), [versatile P](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)),
**Damage** 3d12+20 slashing plus 1d6 electricity

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
rock +35 ([range increment 120 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248)),
**Damage** 3d10+12 bludgeoning plus 1d6 electricity

**Arcane Innate Spells** DC 40
- **3rd**
[Levitate](/Spells.aspx?ID=170) (at will)
- **Constant (4th)**
[Freedom of Movement](/Spells.aspx?ID=128)

**Dragonstorm Blade** <actions string="Three Actions" /> ([Divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48), [Evocation](/Traits.aspx?ID=65)) The dragonstorm fire giant raises one hand to the sky, channeling dragonstorm energy into the blade held in the other. The giant makes a greatsword Strike with a –2 circumstance penalty against each creature within its reach. It makes only one attack roll and compares the result against each creature's AC. This Strike deals an additional 1d8 acid, 1d8 cold, 1d8 electricity, 1d8 fire, and 1d8 poison damage and counts as two attacks for the giant's multiple attack penalty.

**[Throw Rock](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=38)** <actions string="Single Action" />  

</column>
name: Dragonstorm Fire Giant

text: Dragonstorm Fire Giant Recall Knowledge - Humanoid (Society): DC 43 Unspecific Lore : DC 41 Specific Lore : DC 38 Dragonstorm Fire Giant Source Pathfinder #150: Broken Promises pg. 12 Perception +30; low-light vision Languages Auran, Common, Draconic, Jotun Skills Acrobatics +31, Athletics +35, Intimidation +35 Str +9 Dex +6 Con +7 Int +3 Wis +5 Cha +2 Items +2 greater striking greatsword , +2 greater resilient hide armor , sack with 5 rocks --- AC 42 Fort +33 Ref +27 Will +30 HP 400 Immunities fire Resistances acid 20, electricity 20, cold 20, poison 20 Weaknesses good 20 Catch Rock Reaction --- Speed 35 feet Melee Single Action greatsword +35 (Magical, reach 15 feet, versatile P), Damage 3d12+20 slashing plus 1d6 electricity Ranged Single Action rock +35 (range increment 120 feet), Damage 3d10+12 bludgeoning plus 1d6 electricity Arcane Innate Spells DC 40 - 3rd Levitate (at will) - Constant (4th) Freedom of Movement Dragonstorm Blade Three Actions (Divine, Evocation) The dragonstorm fire giant raises one hand to the sky, channeling dragonstorm energy into the blade held in the other. The giant makes a greatsword Strike with a –2 circumstance penalty against each creature within its reach. It makes only one attack roll and compares the result against each creature's AC. This Strike deals an additional 1d8 acid, 1d8 cold, 1d8 electricity, 1d8 fire, and 1d8 poison damage and counts as two attacks for the giant's multiple attack penalty. Throw Rock Single Action
